name: Exostorm
description: A classic top-down vertical scrolling "shoot-em-up" with amazing music and art.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista+ Processor: <5 years old Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 Class DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space

reviews.review_text: It's good, and for the price, you can't go wrong, but for me, no bueno. The art is great, yes, but the 'Amazing music' Isn't much so. Bosses are very anti-climatic, and just feel like a large common enemy, there's no real excitement from it all.
